title: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Creamy and mildly spiced North Indian curry with paneer.
instructions: Saute onions, grind to paste, cook with tomato puree, add spices and cream, finish with paneer.

title: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic layered rice dish cooked with marinated chicken.
instructions: Marinate chicken, half-cook rice, layer with fried onions & spices, dum cook.

title: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy riceâ€“lentil crepes with spiced potato filling.
instructions: Prepare batter, ferment, spread dosa, fill with potato masala.

title: Veg Fried Rice
description: Quick Indo-Chinese stir-fried rice with vegetables.
instructions: Stir fry veggies, add cooked rice, season with soy sauce.

title: Pasta Alfredo
description: Creamy Italian pasta with parmesan sauce.
instructions: Boil pasta, cook cream-garlic sauce, mix and finish with cheese.

title: Garlic Bread
description: Toasted bread with garlic butter and herbs.
instructions: Spread garlic butter, toast in oven.

title: Chocolate Brownies
description: Rich fudgy brownies with cocoa flavor.
instructions: Mix wet and dry ingredients, bake 25 mins.

title: Pav Bhaji
description: Mumbai-style mashed vegetable curry served with buttered pav.
instructions: Cook veggies, mash with spices, serve with toasted pav.

title: Hakka Noodles
description: Classic Indo-Chinese stir-fried noodles.
instructions: Boil noodles, stir fry vegetables, mix sauces.

title: Veg Pulao
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with vegetables.
instructions: Saute spices, add vegetables & rice, cook on low flame.

title: Dal Tadka
description: Yellow lentils cooked with a spicy ghee tempering.
instructions: Cook dal, add ghee tadka with garlic & spices.

title: Egg Curry
description: Boiled eggs simmered in onion-tomato gravy.
instructions: Cook masala, add eggs, simmer 10 mins.

title: Aloo Paratha
description: Stuffed wheat flatbread with spiced potato filling.
instructions: Prepare dough, cook stuffed parathas.

title: Chole
description: Spicy Punjabi chickpea curry.
instructions: Pressure cook chole, add masala paste.

title: Tomato Soup
description: Creamy blended tomato soup.
instructions: Boil tomatoes, blend, simmer with cream.

title: Fruit Salad
description: Healthy mixed fruits bowl.
instructions: Chop fruits, mix with honey/lemon.

title: French Fries
description: Crispy fried potato strips.
instructions: Cut potatoes, deep fry twice.

title: Omelette
description: Simple fluffy egg omelette.
instructions: Beat eggs, add veggies, cook 3 mins.

title: Idli Sambar
description: Soft steamed idlis served with sambar.
instructions: Steam idlis, prepare sambar.

title: Grilled Sandwich
description: Vegetable grilled sandwich with chutney.
instructions: Assemble veggies, grill till golden.
